Description: Business Manager for Luxury Chauffeur CompanyWe are a newly established company specializing in luxury chauffeur services. Customers can book us for airport transfers, weddings, full-day services, corporate transportation, and more.For this, we are looking for someone who can join us in the startup phase.Your responsibilities will include running the company, seeking potential clients, managing all aspects of marketing, planning routes, maintaining customer relationships, and sending invoices. Please note that this is the initial phase, and we hope to expand, which may lead to delegating some tasks to other staff, allowing you to focus entirely on managing the business.Skills
Skills:
Familiarity with Dubai: You are knowledgeable about Dubai, its infrastructure, regulations, and are familiar with everyday details.
Fluent English Speaker: You speak English fluently, and while not mandatory, proficiency in Arabic is a plus.
Computer Proficiency: You are proficient in computer programs such as Microsoft Word and similar software.
Flexible Work Attitude: You do not adhere strictly to a 9-to-5 mentality and are adaptable to varying work hours and demands.
